description: The codes and descriptions that make up the IETF BCP-47 language tags.
name: BCP-47 IETF Language tag

text.div:
BCP-47 IETF Language tag

The codes and descriptions that make up the IETF BCP-47 language tags.

Copyright Statement: TBD

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://www.iana.org/assignments/language-subtag-registry
